jump_scares.spoiler: The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
Beau is attacked by one of the creatures (while we get some warning the attack is quite loud and violent)
Regan knocks over a lamp during a game of monopoly and the ensuing loud noise during a previously quiet scene may be quite startling for some viewers
There is a loud bang on the roof of the house
As Lee listens by a window, a raccoon suddenly screeches and runs past
A raccoon is suddenly attacked by one of the creatures
As Regan is about to descend the stairs, Lee grabs her and pulls her back
Marcus walks past an old man who is watching him in the background
A creature walks past the doorway above the stairs
The creature makes a loud noise
Evelyn puts a bloodied hand on the shower window startling Lee
As Regan goes to pick up the torch, Marcus grabs her wrist
Marcus falls through a metal door and lands in the grain silo
The creature drops down into the grain silo beside Regan
After a period of silence we see the creature outside the car, the creature then breaks through the window with a loud crash
After holding the map up to the car window, Lorraine suddenly moves it away. The sudden noise and movement accompanied by the tension of the scene may startle some people
As Lorraine looks into the rear view mirror during a tense scene, the car horn suddenly blares
As Ed says “that should do it” and lowers the bonnet, Lorraine sees a group of ghosts standing behind him, seconds later one of the ghosts pushes Ed to the ground
A truck suddenly appears out of the fog and almost runs Ed over
A box on the shelf suddenly closes startling Daniela
As Daniela approaches the empty rocking chair, the door suddenly slams closed
As the camera pans across to Daniela, we see the disfigured face of her father beside her and he screams “you did this to me!”
As the door to the chicken coup closes, we here loud snarling noises from the dog outside
As Mary Ellen holds the silver coin up, the Ferryman suddenly appears in front of her
Judy is suddenly pulled towards the end of the bed
Accompanied by a sound effect, Judy is pulled back once again
Judy looks under the bed sheets and sees Annabelle, suddenly a girl jumps out of the sheets ad attacks Judy
After seeing the shadow of the demon on her wall, the demon suddenly appears beside Judy
After Judy escapes the bedroom and reunites with Mary Ellen, the door is pushed open and we hear a demonic roar
As Daniela says “everything”, all the objects in the room suddenly turn on at once
The bride suddenly grabs Daniela around the neck
One of the windows in the car breaks startling Judy
The dog suddenly jumps on the roof of the car
The Mary Ellen doppelganger holding Annabelle suddenly screams
As Judy attempts to put Annabelle back in her case, the door shuts and Judy turns around to see the demon right behind her
A torch is briefly shone on a figure before the camera footage cuts out
A loud bang startles James in his tent
Lisa suddenly bursts into James’ tent
There is a burst of static from the walkie-talkie during a quiet scene
Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out
Ashley suddenly pulls Lisa’s hand away from the camera
James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air
An unseen force pulls Ashley out of the tree
A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James
A disheveled Lane suddenly appears in front of Lisa
Lane runs at Lisa while screaming
There are several loud whooshing noises
Lane sees a tall thin figure coming towards her in a hallway
James runs into Lisa
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
Clara turns the light off and Candyman appears behind her for a brief moment. [Video]
Trevor jumps onto Helen while she is in bed
Helen takes a photo of a door and at the same time, the door opens and a dog barks
Bernie is startled by Helen poking her head through the hole in the wall
Helen closes the medicine cabinet and in the mirror a girl and her dog can be seen
Helen looks into a window and a dog jumps up from the other side
There is an abrupt flashback to a boy screaming
Images of the graffitied head on the wall flash up accompanied by loud noises
Candyman’s hook comes through the medicine cabinet at Helen. [Video]
Helen runs into the living room and sees Bernie’s bloodied body
Candyman’s hand appears above Helen
Candyman’s hook appears in front of the baby
Dr. Burke is stabbed by Candyman
Candyman opens his eyes as Helen is about to attack him
Candyman appears and puts his hand over Helen’s mouth
Helen appears behind Trevor in the mirror. [Video]
The toy’s sudden noise may startle some viewers
Eric gets scared by Sara when she opens the bathroom door
The toy’s noise startles Eric
A loud sound comes from the walkie-talkie
After a tense scene, Daniel’s hand suddenly covers Eric’s mouth
The TV turns on loudly
Daniel jumping from the chair after hearing to Eric’s voice along with a loud sound may startle some viewers
Daniel’s voice scares Ruth
The voice of Ruth interrupting the silent tense scene may startle some viewers
After a tense scene, a loud noise comes out of Gérman’s headphones
The screen cuts abruptly to a woman screaming
A toy’s noise spooks Sara
When Sara tries to touch Eric, he quickly crawls under the bed
Eric jumps off the bed to the front of Sara
The witch puts her hand on Sara’s face accompanied by a loud noise
The hanged body of Sara bursts through the room’s window
Something jumps on Daniel
A gunshot is fired frightening Ruth and Gérman
The scene cuts abruptly to a man yelling
A screaming woman runs by in front of Gérman
The witch jumps on Gérman
The witch screams at Ruth twice
Eric runs past Daniel accompanied by a loud sound
The witch screams at Daniel
Some viewers might get scared when Ruth shows up in front of Gérman
Eric’s voice on the walkie-talkie may startle some viewers
In a post-credit scene, a woman being exorcised jumps and screams
The doors burst open
Ganush charges at Christine
A handkerchief suddenly appears in front of Christine’s windscreen
Ganush attacks Christine in the car
Ganush attacks Christine again
Rham Jas suddenly has a vision of a fiery demon as he is reading Christine’s fortune. [Video]
A gust of wind startles Christine
The pots in the kitchen start to clatter into each other
An unseen force knocks Christine back
Ganush suddenly appears in bed beside Christine. [Video]
The silhouette of Lamia pops up in front of Christine
The image of Ganush suddenly appears on Christine’s phone
Lamia appears at the window in front of Christine
A black cat hisses at Christine
Christine pulls back a curtain in the shed to reveal Ganush. [Video]
The sound of a goat bleating startles Christine
There is a loud noise as the spirit enters Shaun
Chrstine goes to check on the assistant, but he turns around suddenly revealing he has been possessed
Christine sees Ganush on the road
Ganush’s handkerchief appears on Chrstine’s windscreen while she is driving
The handkerchief comes out of the fan vent and lands on Christine’s face
Christine pulls at the corpse of Ganush and it suddenly comes free
Ganush’s corpse pops up out of the water
A distressed woman appears on screen
Bright lights flash accompanied by loud sound effects
The telephone booth crashes down behind the shop attendant
April walks backwards into a masked man holding an axe
The lights turn off suddenly
The fuse box sparks
Loud banging can be heard from upstairs
A flash of lightning illuminates an alien outside walking towards the house
Lex is suddenly lifted into the alien ship
On some camera footage, a girl is suddenly abducted into the alien ship
A woman bursts out of a closet
Travis grabs Seth and puts a knife to his neck
An alien silhouette appears behind Travis
Travis, who is hiding underneath a bed, sees some alien feet
An alien hand grabs Travis around the face
A bang can be heard from the other side of the door
April looks through the peep hole in the door and sees an alien eye
A loud noise startles the sheriff
An alien runs quickly past the sheriff
The sheriff turns the car lights on to reveal an alien standing in front of the car
April appears by the car window beside Seth
There is a loud noise and a red light illuminates the room
After a momentary silence there is a loud noise and flashing blue lights
The floor boards begin to break up
Seth is attacked by an alien
Kyle approaches a mirror, suddenly an alien hand bursts through and grabs him
Something sparks near April
The power suddenly comes back on
The probe device suddenly opens
The alien/human hybrid opens its eyes
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
An actor for the horror maze jumps out at the girls
Another actor jumps out from behind them
Another actor jumps out from the blue curtains to the left side of the corridor
A robot witch comes out from the wall
A robot jester comes out from the wall
One of the park actors scares Natalie with a chainsaw while she’s talking to Gavin
An actor dressed as a clown jumps in front of Natalie and Gavin while they’re walking
The actor standing still turns and screams at Taylor
A cloaked actor jumps in front of group
Brooke turns around to leave and runs into Quinn
A mechanical spider drops down from the ceiling in front of Brooke and Quinn
The dead man Ash is looking inside assuming it was a prop suddenly grabs him
One of the actors grabs Taylor and lifts her up
Lights suddenly turn on above the doctor sitting on the chair and he turns to look at the group
The woman on the mattress grabs Ash as he is reaching for the syringe
A hand grabs Brooke from above the fog
One of the hands touches Taylor, frightening her
The lights of a train suddenly turn on behind Ash and Quinn and its horn goes off
The killer bangs on the glass
A light turns on in front of Ash and there is a cut to a growling gargoyle
The killer suddenly opens his eyes as Ash shines the flashlight on him
One of the park actors growls and runs at the group

As Natalie is drying her hair, the camera cuts to the empty bathroom stalls. It then cuts back to Natalie drying her hair and when it cuts to the stalls again the killer is standing right in front of her
The killer’s hand slowly reaches for Natalie’s hair and then suddenly pulls down accompanied by a loud thud sound
A mechanical prop springs out of the box after Brooke says “He’s not in here.
There is a sudden growl
A prop appears on the wall, frightening Brooke. The same prop appears on two more walls as she runs through the hall
The killer’s axe suddenly slashes through the wall
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
There is a slight scare when a walkie talkie makes a loud noise as Georgie descends the stairs to the basement
There is another minor scare as we see Pennywise’s eyes appear at the drain grill in front of Georgie
There is a loud bang on a door as Mike takes out some rubbish
After a rather intense scene, Mike is almost run over by Henry’s car
The distorted woman from the painting appears in front of Stan
In the library basement, Ben is running away from a headless man when Pennywise suddenly appears in front of him and shouts “Egg Boy”
Ben is jumped by Patrick as he leaves the library (this is a very minor jump scare)
Patrick enters the sewerage system and uses an aerosol can and lighter flamethrower style as he hunts for Ben, suddenly he sees various dead children standing in front of him
Patrick sees a balloon in front of him and it pops to reveal Pennywise standing there
The hair from the drain suddenly winds itself around Beverly’s wrist
In the kitchen, Georgie rushes past the screen in the foreground as Bill looks on
Bill sees Georgie in the flooded basement, he slowly begins to decay and suddenly Pennywise rushes through the water towards Bill

The children are in Bill’s garage looking at various slides on a projector screen that suddenly begins to take on a life of its own. Pennywise appears on the projector screen and the kids panic and attempt to turn the projector off. Suddenly Pennywise is coming out of the projector and into the room with them
In the Neibolt street house  Richie, Bill, and Eddie see Betty begging for help at a doorway when she is suddenly pulled off screen
After Richie finds himself locked in the room full of clowns, Richie turns around and a clown doll is standing right behind him and he gets a scare

In a room full of clowns, Richie walks towards a coffin and opens it. The scene is quite suspenseful and we expect a jump scare upon the coffin being opened however the scare doesn’t occur until after Richie closes the lid and Pennywise jumps up from behind
Bill and Richie go through a door marked “not scary” and after a couple of seconds the light is turned on and we see Betty Ripson hanging by ropes
In perhaps the only truly unexpected jump scare, Beverly turns around to leave the bathroom after a confrontation with her father and is attacked by Pennywise who is standing behind her
Beverly notices a music box playing, the music stops and a second later we get a slight jump scare as a toy clown pops out of the box
Stan hears someone whispering his name, he shines the torch down the tunnel and sees Pennywise briefly appear at the opening
Stan looks around with a torch and there is a scare when the distorted woman from the painting rushes at Stan
Eddie slips into the water in a sewer tunnel and sees several floating corpses
There is a slight scare when Georgie’s motionless body suddenly starts to shake
A ladder cracks while Dalton is climbing it
A voice in the baby monitor yells “NOW”
Renai sees a man standing behind her daughter’s crib
The burglar alarm goes off
The burglar alarm goes off again
Renai wakes from a nightmare
A strange man walks through Renai’s bedroom before lunging at her
A small boy runs behind Renai
The door bursts open behind Renai
The small boy opens the wardrobe door and runs out in front of Renai
Lorraine sees a red faced demon standing behind Josh
Tucker sees the image of two women in dresses through his UV light camera
There is a cracking sound and a bright flash of light, followed by several more flashes of light over the next few minutes
Dalton suddenly appears beside the table
A woman in a wedding dress walks past Josh
A strange smiling family suddenly appear in front of Josh
A man suddenly appears in front of the red door
A red faced demon appears beside Josh
A hand reaches out of the drawer as it is being closed
The door bursts open and the strange screaming family are revealed
Tucker shines a torch on a mysterious man
Dalton opens the door in his bedroom and the red demon jumps out from behind
The demon grabs Daltons leg from underneath the bed
A mysterious lady lunges at Elise
Young Elise reaches into a wardrobe and is attacked by a mysterious presence
The scene abruptly changes to a close up of dead Elise
Renai trips over a babies toy which begins to make noise
A kids toy suddenly turns on
Lorraine opens the bathroom door to reveal Josh
A mysterious lady appears standing behind Lorraine and Dalton
A singing lady appears in the living room
The kids high chair and toy suddenly go flying through the air
The mysterious lady appears suddenly, yells “Don’t you dare”, and slaps Renai. [Video]
Several images flash on the screen in quick succession as Carl senses something. [Video]
While in a hospital bed, Parker suddenly grabs young Josh
Renai suddenly wakes from a nightmare
Kids suddenly run out of the bedroom
A lady runs out of Dalton’s closet
Numerous apparitions appear beside Dalton’s bed. [Video]
The scene suddenly cuts to Josh yelling for help in “the further”
An old man suddenly appears in front of Josh chanting “he’s got your baby”. [Video]
A man appears in the window of the babies room
Josh’s face suddenly transforms into that of the evil lady
Josh backs into a room full of shrouded people
Josh lifts the shroud to reveal the mother of Parker who begins attacking Josh
Josh and Carl are surrounded and attacked by a bunch of spirits
Quinn listens against the wall and some sort of generator noise starts
During a quiet scene a car suddenly slams on its brakes and runs over a girl
Quinn looks around in her sleep and a face jumps at her
Elise jumps while lying in bed
While Quinn is resting, a hand grabs her from above
Elise follows dark footsteps onto the wall and looks up to see a demon
Quinn’s friend on skype notices someone in the room. Quinn glances around to see a figure behind the curtain
Quinn looks under the bed and is grabbed from above
Quinn is grabbed while lying on the ground
Quinn looks out the window and is grabbed by the demon
Elise approaches the back of a female who spreads her hair revealing her face
A dark clothed woman jumps at Elise
The camera spins around to reveal Quinn
Elise approaches a man sitting on a bed when she gets jumped by something
The red demon jumps out from behind Elise
Beverly walks into her husband as she packs her belongings
We see dead bodies littering the Derry sewer runoff when suddenly Henry Bowers face appears out of the water
Henry tries to dislodge the balloon under his bed but it pops to reveal the corpse of Patrick Hockstetter behind it
A sudden cut to a gong (as Richie is hugging Bev) being hit may startle some viewers
During an encounter with Pennywise under the bleachers, a girl says “you’re supposed to say 3” and is immediately devoured by Pennywise
A naked monstrous woman runs out at Beverly
The giant statue suddenly appears right beside Richie as he sits on the park bench
Richie closes his eyes and says “it isn’t real”, when he opens them Pennywise suddenly runs at him
A corpse-like hand suddenly grabs Bill when he reaches down to grab Georgie
During the classroom scene, as Beverley says “no matter how many stupid poems you write”, Ben turns around and Beverley’s head is now on fire
Pennywise is suddenly behind Ben in the locker
In present day, Eddie pulls the curtain back but nothing is behind there, he turns around and is suddenly attacked by the rotting corpse
Eddie is washing his face. He adjusts the mirror to reveal Henry Bowers standing behind him
Bill collides with one of the inflatable clowns as he tries to follow the boy into the house of mirrors
As Mike lowers the book he is reading, he is suddenly attacked by Henry Bowers
The Stanley-spider suddenly runs at Richie
As Beverly says “I thought I heard something” a corpse pops up out of the water in front of her
The loud pop as a giant balloon bursts may startle some viewers
Beverly turns her torch on, then immediately shines it on Pennywise
After Eddie says “That’s a good boy”, the Pomeranian dog suddenly transforms into a monster
Georgie turns his head to reveal a corpse-like face
Mike runs into Pennywise
Eddie is impaled by one of Pennywises’s claws after he says “I think I killed him for real”
A now shriveled up Pennywise roars and lunges at Mike as he reaches out to touch him
There is a loud noise and Dennis falls flat
As the camera zooms in on Kristi the power suddenly cuts out
A ball is thrown at the camera
Some sort of spirit flies past the camera
Mike appears behind Skylar
Something flies out of the pool
Leila appears in front of the camera
The bathroom mirror cracks
The dark entity flies at the camera
A figure suddenly rushes at the camera accompanied by a loud noise
Something falls down in front of the camera, startling Emily
Leila suddenly walks in on Ryan and Mike who are looking at camera footage
A Santa toy suddenly turns on
Emma begins talking behind Ryan
Something bangs on the bedroom window
A dark entity bursts through the window behind Emily
Leila suddenly attacks Father Todd
The dark entity rushes past the camera
A toy turns on
The entity whooshes past the camera
An abrupt camera change may startle some viewers
The dark entity can briefly be seen as Leila’s bedroom door suddenly closes
Some sort of force radiates out from the hole in Leila’s wall
The entity suddenly strangles and drags away Father Todd
A hand impales Ryan through the chest
Emily turns the camera night vision on and Katie is shown to be standing in front of the camera
Emily turns around to see Leila watching her
Toby’s foot lands in front of the camera
The camera abruptly cuts off
A young boy lying motionless on the ground suddenly jumps up and attacks a man
A bloodied hand appears on a window
Alice starts to drink from a pond when a mutant suddenly jumps out of it and attacks her
A monster breaks out from underneath some rubble
The creature pierces the roof of the truck that Alice is driving
After colliding with Alice’s car, the creature suddenly roars at Alice
There is a loud noise as Alice bangs into a metallic object
Alice is startled by a printer kicking into life
The red queen says “behind you” and Alice turns around to see a mutant running at her
An armed man pops up as Alice approaches the Umbrella Corporation motorbike
A zombie runs at Chu
A zombie rushes at Alice as she enters Dr. Isaacs’ tank
Alice shoots a flaming zombie
One of the dogs suddenly attacks Christian
Claire yells out to Alice who turns around as a zombie attacks her
The lights start to switch back on
The blades of the fan start to spin as Claire and Abigail go through it
A man falls through a trap door
A mutant rushes past the screen
Razor drops down behind Alice
One of the chained up corpses suddenly lunges at Razor as he walks past it
The mutant attacks Razor
The mutant gets up and runs away
Alice walks into a chain
The mutant drops down from the ceiling
The apparently dead creature gets up and attacks once more
Doc puts his hand on Alice’s shoulder
There is a loud (although not unexpected) explosion
A zombie attacks Dr. Isaacs
A stuffed rabbit toy suddenly turns its head towards Heather
A knife suddenly impales Harry
There is a sudden scene change to a close-up of a pop tart popping out of a toaster
A homeless man’s face suddenly transforms into a disfigured eyeless head
A man startles Heather
Vincent appears behind Heather, startling her out of her hallucination
A figure crosses in front of Harry as he opens a door
A man turns around to reveal his eyes and mouth are sewn shut
A monster (The Missionary) drops down behind Douglas and attacks him
The Missionary appears once more and pulls Douglas away
There is a loud metallic clanking as a door opens
Heather has a dream of Alessa in Silent Hill
Alessa’s image briefly flashes across the screen
Vincent is grabbed by The Missionary
Heather is startled by one of the statues
The statue turns to Heather and opens its eyes
The spider-like creature attacks Heather
Heather shines her torch on a monster
Leonard rushes out of the darkness at Heather
A prisoner grabs at Heather through some bars. [Video]
The doors burst open as Vincent is wheeled in on a hospital bed
Heather looks to her left and sees a man in a gas mask beside her
Jane looks at the bottom of the door when the door-handle begins rattling
Tun begins to develop a photo, when he looks closely at one of the faces in the photo, it spins around suddenly
The room goes dark and flashing lights from Tun’s camera reveal a person standing behind him
Tun walks into a room where a silhouette walks past the camera
Jane walks backwards and a loud yell sounds from around her
Natre appears on the front of the car
Tun flips Natre over in her bed to reveal a skeleton
A hand grabs Tun from behind
Natre is crouched on the ground and Tun sees her head sticking above the mattress
Tun looks to his side to see a face
Tun climbs down the ladder and sees a face
A shadow movies behind Ellison
Trevor begins screaming while coming out of a box
A loud bang startles Ellison
There is a loud banging noise while Ellison is in the attic
Ellison lifts a box lid to uncover a snake
Ellison falls through the attic floor. [Video]
Bughuul’s face on Ellison’s laptop begins to move
Ellison lowers the print of Bughuul’s face only to see the same face mirrored in the backyard outside. [Video]
Ellison sees Trevor’s face hiding in the bushes
Several deceased children are seen standing behind Ellison
A tied up body suddenly comes into view in front of lawnmower. [Video]
A deceased girl appears beside Ellison. [Video]
A deceased girl in a yellow coat appears in the hallway
A deceased girl sits beside Ashley’s bed
Bughuul’s face suddenly appears in front of Ellison while he is peering into the attic. [Video]
A box labelled home movies drops from the attic and lands on the floor beside Ellison
Bughuul’s face abruptly drops into view, just before the final credits roll. [Video]
The phone rings during a scene transition
Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass
The phone rings suddenly
The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare
The demon abruptly screams at Rose during a tense scene
The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect
The demon screams Rose’s name and the scene abruptly changes
The scene cuts to a mangled cadaver
Holly’s head unnaturally drops from her shoulders and dangles in front of the car window
The demon grabs Rose’s face and proceeds to scream
The doctor knocks on Rose’s car window, startling her
The camera cuts back to the doctor who is now replaced by a smiling Carl with blood dripping from his mouth
Rose’s mother yells her name
The demon grabs the door that Rose is trying to close
The demon appears behind Rose and throws her against the wall
Joel begins running at Rose with an associated loud sound effect
Rose turns to see she is back at her childhood home
The desk that Davey and Mackey are carrying bangs into something metallic making a loud noise
Davey’s friends startle him as he watches Mackey and a boy through the window
An unseen assailant suddenly abducts a boy
A ringing telephone startles the boys as they explore a house
A hand appears on the light switch as Woody approaches it
As Davey runs past a window, Mackey suddenly slides it open
Mackey appears directly behind Davey
Davey looks through his binoculars and, accompanied by a sound effect, sees Mackey watching him from his window
Faraday and Woody startle Davey and Tommy as they look through Mackey’s shed
Nikki appears at the window after Woody says “just make this quick ok”
Davey’s walkie talkie bursts into life startling the group
The light bulb blows as Davey tries to turn it on
There is a loud bang from behind as the group approach a door
Tommy takes off his headphones after hearing a noise, Farraday then startles him as a joke
After seeing a body in the bathtub, a hand reaches out and grabs Nikki around the ankle
Davey opens his eyes and a cloth is placed over his mouth
A rock smashes into the windscreen
Mackey appears at the car window
Davey’s ankle is suddenly cut as he hides behind a tree
The water is suddenly started as the camera zooms into the sink
The camera turns and a pair of legs can be seen running away, paired with a sound effect
As the boy backs up he is hit by a bus
A thump comes from within the freezer
Rosentock is stabbed in the hand as he examines the cupboard
The demon in the cupboard moves suddenly, moving all of the utensils with it
The creature in the window of the background suddenly appears in the foreground
The tall demon suddenly appears from under the bed
A demon hand comes out and kills Mora
